did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Historical Collections, Claude Moore Health Sciences Library, University of Virginia
did.unittitle: University of Virginia Health System Marketing Communications collection, 1857-2006, bulk 1950-2000
did.physdesc: 10 boxes measuring 10.5 inches x 12.5 inches x 15.5 inches; total of 10.5 linear feet

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: Some access restrictions may apply to photographic materials.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: Some materials may be subject to copyright restrictions.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: University of Virginia Health System Marketing Communications collection, Accession #MS-68, Historical Collections, Claude Moore Health Sciences Library, University of Virginia, Charlottesville, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: The materials were transferred to the Claude Moore Health Sciences Library for preservation from the University of Virginia Health System’s Marketing Communications Department.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: The University of Virginia Health System Marketing Communications collection consists of 5 series. Series I through Series IV contain 737 processed folders in 6 records boxes. The images in this collection were created by and/or for the University of Virginia Health System’s Department of Marketing Communications to document the people, premises, and events of the UVA Health System, the UVA School of Medicine, and the UVA School of Nursing. These four series hold photographic prints, negatives, and slides, and also contain some published materials and assorted Marketing Communications papers and correspondence related to past Marketing Communications publications. The images provide a visual history of the University of Virginia’s work in medical education and medical care throughout the twentieth century. Series V of the collection contains 4 boxes of unprocessed slides, image CDs, and zip disks. At the time of processing some non-Health System materials present with the original acquisition were transferred to the Albert and Shirley Small Special Collections Library and the Arthur J. Morris Law Library.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p:
The records are arranged in four series with the documents within each series arranged according to subject matter and chronology. The series are:
Series I, Departmental materials, 1907-2002
Series II, Buildings and grounds, 1857-2006
Series III, Events and people, 1873-2006
Series IV, Marketing publications and related materials, 1991-2004
Series V, Unprocessed materials

did.unittitle: Series I: Departmental materials, 1907-2002

scopecontent.p: This series consists of images from various departments within the UVA Health System.

arrangement.p: The records are arranged into sub-series according to department. Items in each subseries are arranged chronologically.
